HERO.TITLE: Start Your IT Career with Professional Mentorship
HERO.SUBTITLE: Get personalized guidance from an industry expert
HERO.CARD_TEXT: Tailored to your goals and pace

ABOUT.TITLE: About Me
ABOUT.SUBTITLE: Learn from an experienced professional
ABOUT.DESCRIPTION: Hello! I'm excited to offer you personalized IT mentorship, drawing on my 7 years of experience in Canada and education from two countries. My goal is to help you achieve your IT career objectives, regardless of your current skill level or age. With over 30 successfully completed projects, a Bachelor's degree in Software Engineering from Ukraine, and a 2-year Graduate Certificate in Mobile Solutions Development from a Canadian college, I'm eager to share my knowledge and expertise to help you develop the skills needed for success in the tech industry. Let's work together to chart your path to professional growth!

WHY_MENTORSHIP.SUBTITLE: Discover how personalized mentorship can accelerate your IT career
